name: Industrial Miner
description:
Controls

This game only requires the left click button on the mouse and you left click blocks to mine

How does it fit the theme

The way is fits the theme is not obvious as i have to describe it. The way it fits is by the more blocks you mine, the less that block is worth so it will give you less cash for it. which fits the more you have, the worse it is.

What is it

This game is a down-scrolling mining game where you mine blocks and ores until your pickaxe gets broken and then you go to the shop to upgrade it and then repeat
